{%set grouped_list = frappe.db.sql(""" SELECT count(name) as count,item_code,sum(qty) as total,GROUP_CONCAT(spp_batch_no) as gr_spp_batch_no from `tabMixing Center Items` WHERE parent=%(dc_id)s group by item_code order by spp_batch_no asc """,{"dc_id":doc.name},as_dict=1) %} {% set t_address = frappe.db.sql(""" SELECT warehouse_name,address_line_1,city,state,pin,phone_no FROM `tabWarehouse` WHERE name=%(t_warehouse)s """,{"t_warehouse":doc.target_warehouse},as_dict=1)%} {% set s_address = frappe.db.sql(""" SELECT warehouse_name,address_line_1,city,state,pin,phone_no FROM `tabWarehouse` WHERE name=%(t_warehouse)s """,{"t_warehouse":doc.source_warehouse},as_dict=1)%}
